to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Speaku is not loaded at startup
body:
>>>>> "H" == Hermann   writes:

    H> Hi, how can I acieve that the speakup kernel module is loaded at
    H> startup? Today I booted my system and had to reload sftsyn
    H> manually; I want speakup at startup. Hermann
speakup_sftsyn put in to /etc/modules
